professional_summary: Database Administrator with expertise in Oracle 9i, 10g, 11g Administration; experienced in database security, backup/recovery procedures; highly organized and analytical; strong focus on delivering results under deadlines.

key_responsibilities: Performs regular health checkup of production and test databases.
Performs backup and recovery using RMAN
Applies Oracle Critical Patch Updates (CPU) on databases every quarter.
Exports data using expdp and impdp

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Business Information Systems
